Subject: Forms and Features - MAXIMALS!

As TUCSON waited for his child to be born a winged shape appeared in
the air flying nearly soundlessly. It was a silver and black dragon,
one nearly as large as the ancient Dragon who's form TUCSON had taken,
but so old.

As it arrived the other dragons in the area began to back away, not in
fear but in reverence as they bowed low before him, some of them
muttering the word, "The Disciple' under their breath.

The dragon turned to look at TUCSON, silver eyes with black pupils,
looking almost human in its draconic head. "Greetings Tucson." It
said, somehow knowing his name.

(TAG)

- Preston
